amendment.description: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for nonregular service from 60 to 55.

action.text: Amendment SA 1811 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1811 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 381.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1811.

Amendment SA 1811 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S12523-12524; text: CR S12523) To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for nonregular service from 60 to 55.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1811 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 381.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1811 proposed by Senator Corzine.
